    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        @RequestMapping(value="sections",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject add​(@RequestBody
                                           com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.pojo.Section section)
        添加
        指定者:
        add 在类中 BaseController<com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.pojo.Section>
        参数:
        name - 管舱段名称
        tunnelId - 管廊id
        storeId - 管舱id
        areaId - 区域id
        totalCableNumber - 设计可安装管线总数
        camera - 相机视角（字符串）
        startPoint - 开始坐标 格式：112.494028,37.707195,6.130
        endPoint - 结束坐标 格式：112.4994028,37.706120,6.130
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{}}
        date
        2018年7月25日

        检查名称是否重复
        参数:
        name -
        返回:
        true:可添加 false：不可添加

      • dataGrid

        @RequestMapping(value="sections/datagrid",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject dataGrid​(@RequestBody
                                                com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.vo.SectionVo vo)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        管舱段分页查询
        参数:
        name - 管舱段名称（支持模糊查询）
        tunnelId - 管廊id
        storeId - 管舱id
        areaId - 区域id
        pageNum - 必须
        pageSize - 必须
        startTime - 开始时间
        endTime - 结束时间
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{"total":22,"list":[{"id":5,"name":"5区-燃气仓","totalCableNumber":5,"camera":null,"startPoint":null,"endPoint":null,"crtTime":1535611491000,"store":{"id":1,"name":"燃气仓","tunnel":{"id":1,"name":"古城大街"},"storeType":{"id":1,"name":"燃气仓","crtTime":1535611490000},"camera":null,"crtTime":1535611490000},"area":{"id":5,"name":"5区","location":"1","tunnelId":1,"camera":null,"crtTime":1535611490000}},{"id":6,"name":"6区-燃气仓","totalCableNumber":5,"camera":null,"startPoint":null,"endPoint":null,"crtTime":1535611491000,"store":{"id":1,"name":"燃气仓","tunnel":{"id":1,"name":"古城大街"},"storeType":{"id":1,"name":"燃气仓","crtTime":1535611490000},"camera":null,"crtTime":1535611490000},"area":{"id":6,"name":"6区","location":"1","tunnelId":1,"camera":null,"crtTime":1535611490000}}],"pageNum":1,"pageSize":2,"size":2,"startRow":1,"endRow":2,"pages":11,"prePage":0,"nextPage":2,"isFirstPage":true,"isLastPage":false,"hasPreviousPage":false,"hasNextPage":true,"navigatePages":8,"navigatepageNums":[1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8],"navigateFirstPage":1,"navigateLastPage":8,"firstPage":1,"lastPage":8}}
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

        @RequestMapping(value="tunnels/stores/areas/sections/condition",
                method=POST)
